title: 史诗攻城Mod如何修改怪物血量和攻击力
author: sahdsg
txt_content: RT，服务器开了一段时间后，怪物的血量和攻击力都成倍数增加，面对80血量的僵尸，新人不知所措。。。

epicsiegemod.cfg# The factor by which mob health and damage multipliers will be increased when bosses are killed [range: 0.0 ~ 3.4028235E38, default: 0.1]
